metadata.description: cc10x Plugin Marketplace - Professional development tools for 10x productivity with Claude Code

plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: Intelligent orchestration system combining commands, sub-agents, and skills. Features comprehensive feature planning, TDD enforcement, systematic debugging (LOG FIRST), multi-dimensional code review, cross-artifact validation, and Lovable/Bolt-quality UI generation. Includes 5 commands, 7 sub-agents, 16 skills, and 3 automation hooks for 10x developer productivity.
